response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product stands out for its unique features and exceptional performance, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. Given its superior quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for $150.
